reviewText: My almost 2 year old Granddaughter absolutely LOVES Caillou.  This 3 DVD pack is wonderful. Two of the three DVD's have unterrupted cartoons. The third one does have those pesky puppets that I have to fast-forward through. All in all, the purchase was more than worth it. I also appreciate others who let us know if they have to contend with the puppets, as the children don't seem to care for them.
We love Caillou, and these holiday episodes are great for our little ones.  Can't get enough of this 4 year old:)
I would recommend this product to people. thank you for your swift and smooth transaction. This is a great product we just love it.

My granddaughter is 2 years old and a big Caillou fan.  We watch a lot of it on TV but there are many reruns.  This DVD is great because they don't show a lot of these programs on TV, so they are something fresh for her to watch.

I have only opened and viewed one cd out of the 3 but I can tell you that it has way too much other kinds of entertainment than the caillou cartoon. It has the stuff animals associated with caillou and a lot of other clips of children playing, etc. It might be ok for an older child but my 2 yr old only wants to watch caillou! If I had known there would be so much of other kinds of things mixed in I would have made a different choice.
My little girl just loves Caillou on sprout, so i figured this was a win win purchase and i was right.  I was happy to get episodes that we hadnt seen yet.

enjoys this collection. She does eventually become bored and wanders off to something else. My only complaint is that each episode is too short (perhaps 10 minutes) in comparison to those offered on TV.

Wonderful.  It is well worth it.  Many episodes and holidays.  My kids love it.  Great color and wonderful friend interaction.

For anyone who has a child that is obsessed with Caillou, this is a great DVD pack. There are 3 disks which means hours of viewing pleasure.
This was brand new so was in excellent condition. My 2 year old and 4 year old love this little boy! It was a great addition to our collection :)

My son loves Caillou, and this DVD pack is great for the price. The only thing he hates, and I have heard this from a lot of moms, is the one dvd with the puppets. He just wants to watch the cartoon, and he hates the constant interruptions from the puppets. Two of the dvds have just the cartoon, though, so it is still a great buy. They are cute episodes, and he loves watching them.
My friends son is 2yrs old and loves this movie. He is always asking to watch it with his daddy..
Purchased for my granddaughter for her birthday. Given to her parents since she is only 2. No comment from them. But most of all it was a very nice gift.
My grandkids enjoy watching Caillou. I don't not think the character is whinny or babyish. It is clean, simply and teaches lessons with every episode.
My 3 year old grandson cannot get enough of Caillou.  A really nice video for him.  He wants to watch it every day.

My son is almost 3 and recently has really "gotten into" Caillou on the Sprout channel. We have a couple other DVDs of Caillou and I thought this one would be great because it has the Christmas movie, which he loved last year.
All 3 DVDs are great, I particularly like how one goes into the season about Fall and Winter and not just the holiday.  This also has the shorts with the puppets of Gilbert, Teddy and Rexy in it, my son loves those.  There are also some "live action" segments with kids dressed up for the holiday singing.  The Halloween ones are a bit scary looking for 2 and 3 year olds, at least in my opinion.  For 3 DVDs at this price it's a steal.... definitely pick this up for anyone with children 2-4 or for your own....
Another great collection of Caillou dvd's that my child loves to see during her alotted tv time.  They have many stories on them.
Number one pick for my granddaughter for entertainment! Well done and I I like to watch it ,too! Love Caillou!
